reviews.title: Great service
reviews.text: Great service. It took all of the logistics work out of my hand. I didn't even know it was called "Logistics." LOL

reviews.title: Excellent service
reviews.text: On time delivery. Excellent customer service.  Would recommend 100%

reviews.title: A great experience
reviews.text: Freightos is a well thought out business with a good user interface and good customer services. I would have no hesitation in recommending Freightos to any business using international freight. Inspired Angling Ltd

companyReply.text: Thanks so much for this review! We're so pleased to hear you had such a great experience and would recommend Freightos.com to other businesses. (We actually have a referral program to help you do just that). Looking forward to working with you again soon.

reviews.title: The estimator software they have works….
reviews.text: The estimator software they have works well and the quotes stay the same $$$ in reality. Also their logistics works well as a crew to get the jobs done. Their pricing is in the middle.

companyReply.text: Thanks for your review. Our prices are real-time quotes so they are always as accurate as possible. Glad to hear everyone did everything they could to get your shipment to you - that's how we like to work at Freightos.com!

reviews.title: Pretty solid experience
reviews.text: Pretty solid experience, I liked the prices available on their platform. Very fair!

companyReply.text:
We're pleased to hear you had a good experience on Freightos.com and that our prices met your expectations. 

Looking forward to you shipping with us again.

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.text: Quick, painless, and inexpensive - hard to beat!

companyReply.text: Those are three words we like to hear from users on Freightos.com!

reviews.title: As easy as a couple clicks!
reviews.text: Shipping Goods from A to B (China to Canada), was as easy as a couple clicks on a well built and simple webpage! No surprises, no price change, quite easy!

companyReply.text: Thanks for your feedback. Our aim at Freightos.com is to make it as easy as possible to book shipments. We're glad we made it so simple for you.

reviews.title: Delivery is on time
reviews.text: Delivery is on time. No surprises.

companyReply.text: No surprises is exactly what we like to hear at freightos.com! Glad it worked out so well for you.

reviews.title: So far good
reviews.text: So far, my experience with this shipping marketplace is good. Clear interface, clear information. Prices maybe a little bit higher that dealing directly with agents, but totally worth it in my opinion

companyReply.text: Thanks so much for your review. We're really happy that your experiences with freightos.com have been positive and hope that they continue to be so with future shipments. We definitely pride ourselves on being clear and transparent and making it easy to get your shipments moving.

reviews.title: Highly impressed with Express Shipment options.
reviews.text:
I wanted the product in this shipment as quickly as I could. Normally, I would source and arrange all the different methods of shipment, but it was a great opportunity to us the Express shipment features available on FreightOS. My product arrived in less than a week from CN to CA and I didn't have to lift a finger - except to unload the product at my location. I didn't have to negotiate pickup in a foreign country, or the handoff to the freight forwarder.
 The transparency and communication with this shipment was excellent.

companyReply.text: We’re so glad you took a chance on trying out our Express features. You should know we’re big fans of our customers not having to lift a finger after they book a shipment. In fact, it’s how we designed the Freightos.com platform. We’re also really pleased that your product arrived so quickly and that the communication and the transparency more than met your expectations.

reviews.title: Awesome experience
reviews.text: My first time using Freightos and SeaBay was excellent from start to finish. Timely service, awesome communication and all packages arrived in perfect condition. I’ll be using for all my international shipments!

companyReply.text: We’re so glad to hear that your first experience using freightos.com was so positive! We’re very fussy when it comes to deciding which freight forwarders we put on our platform - and only work with those able to provide the high-quality service you received. Looking forward to assisting you with many more shipments soon.

reviews.title: Quotes were accurate
reviews.text: Quotes were accurate, Freightos' freight forwarder are consistant and consist of high quality, detail oriented companies.

reviews.title: Freightos is hands-down the best…
reviews.text: Freightos is hands-down the best shipping company I've worked with. I've been importing for over five years and was highly pleased with their detailed website containing everything I needed to know about my shipment. I was even more pleased that my shipment was pain-free from start to finish!

companyReply.text: Thanks for the great feedback about the Freightos.com platform. There’s nothing we like to hear more than the words “pain free!” As a long-time importer, you know just how important it is to have transparency and up-to-date information about your shipment, and we’re thrilled we did such a good job of living up to your expectations.

reviews.title: All my concerns were put to rest after…
reviews.text: All my concerns were put to rest after using this service. Very easy and self explanatory for even a novice like me. Compliance is always an issue when you are new to the process but this service made step by step guide we breezed through the whole process.

companyReply.text: We know how complicated and confusing shipping can be for novices, so we’re delighted to hear that using freightos.com made the process a breeze. We’re always working on ways to make the shipping process easier and more efficient for everyone and we’re glad to hear we took a huge chunk of the stress away for you.

reviews.title: Fantastic service for those seeking to…
reviews.text: Fantastic service for those seeking to choose the best value for a logistics provider. Saved me so much time and effort by instantly giving me several quotes. Made communication with the provider easy and straightforward, as well as payment processing, tracking, etc. I can't recommend this service enough.

companyReply.text: Thanks for this review of freightos.com. We feel so seen! We’re so glad we made the whole process easy and straightforward from start to finish and we’re looking forward to working with you again.

translations.firstreviewer: Be the first to review us on
